---
title: "Load Data"
output: html_notebook
---

Load the necessary functions:
```{r}
  source("clean_data.R")
```

```{r}
  get_cleaned_bookings()
```



```{r}

reservations <- get_cleaned_reservations()


# subsetting data for avg room price and cancellation status

room_vs_cancellation <- data.frame(reservations$arrival_month, reservations$booking_status, reservations$avg_price_per_room)



library(tidyverse)

ggplot(room_vs_cancellation, aes(reservations$arrival_month,reservations$avg_price_per_room, fill = reservations$booking_status)) + geom_bar(position = "stack", stat = "identity") 



```
